name: genevenn
short_description: A web application for comparing gene lists using venn diagrams. This Program has a core PHP function that generates venn diagrams, with user input as gene lists, through html forms using java script. the lists are also interactively available through the generated venn diagrams. this tool could also be used to compare any type of list data, not just gene lists.
summary: A web application for comparing gene lists using venn diagrams
